column5: Hey Guys and Gals, I'm heading to Arrowhead Provincial Park with the fam and some friends.  I’m considering bringing the big boat (17.2 Smokercraft with 90 Merc and riggers) to tour some other lakes in the area (Bernard maybe??) as no motors allowed in this park. Alternatively, I may just bring the canoe and fish the park’s lake for bass but I’d love to get into some trout.  What would you do?  Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks in advance, T
